hero.title: Energy beyond Earth
hero.subtitle: The power infrastructure for the space industrial revolution

vision.title: Power abundance, not power budgets
vision.body:
Computing, manufacturing, and mining, are moving to space.

This is the space industrial revolution.

This requires a space power grid to delivery power wherever it is needed, on demand, day or night.

problem.title: Space has a power problem
problem.body:
Today’s satellites are like factories generating their power locally with water wheels or steam engines in the industrial revolution.

The power grid decoupled power generation from consumption, enabling power on-demand and modern industry.

technology.title: Technology
technology.body:
Power beaming will be the power grid infrastructure for the space industrial revolution

It unlocks a new market in which satellite power can be purchased, traded, and shared.

Surplus power can be sold.
Additional power can be purchased.

Power can be delivered to eclipsed regions, including the two-week lunar night.

flow.label: Generation
flow.copy: High-efficiency power generation and conditioning at source nodes.
flow.infra: Orbital arrays, converters, and power management units.

flow.label: Beaming
flow.copy: Directed transmission routes energy to demand zones in real time.
flow.infra: Pointing systems, relay nodes, and network controls.

features.title: Adaptive RF Pathing
features.description: Maintains delivery efficiency through changing geometry and thermal conditions.

features.title: Fault-Tolerant Energy Core
features.description: Redundant topology for graceful degradation and mission continuity.

features.title: Mission-Aware Controls
